name: Object-observe-polyfill
description: Object.observe Polyfill/shim ============================ Thanks to my new job I have a lot more time to devote to things like this library.  It has gone a REALLY long time without updates and there is a lot that can be done to make it more functional.  I hope to be spending more time on it soon, but for now I've fixed all the bugs that I know of and have been reported.  Thanks to everyone for their reports, and keep them coming if you find one.
